analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/21/0x813fb09e6725f5eae9b30a7e84c237c77bedc1a4.sol:

	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/21/0x813fb09e6725f5eae9b30a7e84c237c77bedc1a4.sol#118-119)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
